description: Pulling in elements of both classic Zelda and Super Mario Maker, Quest Master has a really entertaining idea that sees you design dungeons and go on adventures.
title: Zelda-inspired dungeon maker 'Quest Master' arrives May 29th with a new demo live

description: #DRIVE Rally from Polish developer Pixel Perfect Dude now has a release window for sometime this Autumn and it looks like a lot of fan for rally fans.
title: Get ready to kick-up some dust in #DRIVE Rally

description: I love my Steam Deck, as any regular reader will know. It's my favourite gaming device but it could always be better right? And with competition hot (hi Nintendo), I hope Valve have more plans.
title: With a Nintendo Switch 2 on the way, I hope Valve make a Steam Deck 2

description: The Thaumaturge released back in March from Fool's Theory and 11 bit studios, it looks pretty great and now it is Steam Deck Verified.
title: Story-driven RPG 'The Thaumaturge' is now Steam Deck Verified

description: V Rising took Steam by storm back when it hit Early Access in 2022, and now Stunlock Studios have released the big 1.0 with lots of upgrades and it should work better than ever for Steam Deck players.
title: Vampire survival game V Rising 1.0 live with gamepad support (good for Steam Deck)

description: Selaco is easily the game I am most excited about this year, a GZDoom powered shooter that had a brilliant demo but Altered Orbit Studios are about to delist the demo.
title: Awesome GZDoom shooter Selaco demo will be delisted (but you can still get it)

description: Selaco is easily the game I am most excited about this year, a GZDoom powered shooter that had a brilliant demo but Altered Orbit Studios are about to delist the demo.
title: Awesome GZDoom shooter Selaco will delist the demo (but you can still get it)

description: Forming part of what they're calling Stellaris Season 08, both The Machine Age DLC and the free Andromeda update are out now.
title: The Machine Age DLC for Stellaris out now along with free Andromeda update

description: After a couple of Beta releases, Valve has now launched the latest stable release of SteamVR which brings in the recent Linux improvements.
title: SteamVR 2.5 released with multiple Linux fixes
